short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gantt charts and scheduling within Basecamp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GanttWork adds Gantt charts for easy and beautiful scheduling all within Basecamp 3 UI. Now you can stay in the app you love while accessing even more features.
